views.markdown:
Urgent fixes fixes couple of bugs where the settings are now stored correctly What's New:-

1- Phone++ now compatible with iOS 9 and iOS 10
2- Introduce Avatar in Contacts just like in Copic
3- Introduce HUDIndex in Contacts for quick index jumps in the contacts and other apps.

4- Re-implemented and re-designed settings into a more categorized way.

More updates to Come
Adding support to LinkedIn - Visit LinkedIn User Profile directly from the Phone App.

Fix a minor bug when changing the theme.

Phone++ v2.0.0 has been re-engineered from the ground up to support iOS 9.

Phone++ v2.0.0 containst a powerful engine that can be easily configured from the settings panel which has been re-designed to accommodate for a lot more configurations.

introduced a long swipe gesture for right and left directions. Easily configure the action of each long swipe to either make a call or message a contact. The color of each long swipe can also be easily configured.

There will be more functionalities coming up.
